alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 30 at 12:08AM CDT until May 30 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Valley County in central Nebraska... Northwestern Sherman County in central Nebraska... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1207 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles southwest of Arcadia, or 23 miles southwest of Ord, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Arcadia around 1225 AM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
